titleStmt.title: I ve Got Something To Say

publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: I don't really know Trying not to show
For a place that can't be found
I don't really mind Leaving all behind
Don't you think it's too late
Put it straight, I'm not your kind ...
Will you look me in the eye Don't you stare high above
I've got no more tears to cry I forgot what is love
Don't stand still, why can't you lie?
Want it all and now Start by showing how
I don't want to come down
I'm a queen without a crown
Why I let you go Explanations are far
Take it slow, I'm not your car ...
Will you look me in the eye Don't you stare high above...
